Trinity::

"I don't like lost Aerotaur, Windlord and Nightlight like my dad and 
my mom... And I'm a big fearsome predacon" replied Trinity "With my 
roar I can do that a mean-bot run away.."

Trinity roared like a little kitty and said proudly "You see..."
